links.title: Links page
links.content:
GeoNetwork opensource related links The GeoNetwork opensource Community website contains software, documentation, tutorials, excersises etc..
The GeoNetwork opensource Developer website
The Open Source Geospatial Foundation
GeoNetwork catalogs GeoNetwork at the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
GeoNetwork at the The Vulnerability Analysis and Mapping (VAM) Unit from the World Food Program (WFP)
GeoNetwork at the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA)
GeoNetwork at the Consultative Group for International Agriculture Research (CGIAR)
Spatial Data Infrastructures UNGIWG United Nations Geographic Information Working Group
Global Spatial Data Infrastructure (GSDI)
Group on Earth Observations (GEO)
Standards Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC)
ISO - TC211 Geographic information/Geomatics
US Federal Geographic Data Committee (FDGC)
Mapping Initiatives International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
Other related sites African Data Dissemination Service
NOAA National Geophysical Data Center, NGDC
US National Geospatial-intelligence Agency (NGA)
Earth Observation Portal (ESA)
ESRI ArcData Online
